alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:58PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Monterey County through 230 PM PDT... At 157 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Bradley, or 20 miles north of Paso Robles, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Ardo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
